MultiMessageUnit.name: Message3
MultiMessageUnit.Message: Jugaadu is an online home services marketplace which connects home service professionals to the customers.It has raised $27m in two rounds of funding from six investors including Amazon, Matrix Partners and Vertex Ventures. The company is based out of Rome and operates in Rome, Pisa ,Milan & Venice.

PowerIndexUnit.name: Jugaadu.it

MultiMessageUnit.name: Message5
MultiMessageUnit.Message: PLEASE READ THE TERMS OF USE THOROUGHLY AND CAREFULLY. The terms and conditions set forth below ("Terms of Use") and the Privacy Policy (as defined below) constitute a legally-binding agreement between Jugaadu Technologies India Pvt Ltd ("Jugaadu"), and you. These Terms of Use contain provisions that define your limits, legal rights and obligations with respect to your use of and participation in (i) the Jugaadu website and mobile application, including the classified advertisements, forums, various email functions and Internet links, and all content and Jugaadu services available through the domain and sub-domains of Jugaadu located at www.Jugaadu.com (collectively referred to herein as the "Website"), and (ii) the online transactions between those users of the Website who are offering services (each, a "Service Professional") and those users of the Website who are obtaining services (each, a "Service User") through the Website (such services, collectively, the "Services"). The Terms of Use described below incorporate the Privacy Policy and apply to all users of the Website, including users who are also contributors of video content, information, private and public messages, advertisements, and other materials or Services on the Website.
